退.definition: to retreat; to withdraw; to reject; to return (sth); to decline

退下.definition: to retire; to withdraw; to retreat; to step down

退件.definition: to reject (visa application etc); (commerce) to return to sender; item returned to sender

退任.definition: to retire; to leave one's position

退伍.definition: to be discharged from military service

退休.definition: to retire (from the workforce); to go into retirement

退休金雙軌制.pinyin: tuì xiū jīn shuāng guǐ zhì
退休金雙軌制.definition: see 養老金雙軌制|养老金双轨制[yang3 lao3 jin1 shuang1 gui3 zhi4]

退冰.definition: to thaw (frozen food); to bring to room temperature

退出.definition: to withdraw; to abort; to quit; to log out (computing)

退回.definition: to return (an item); to send back; to go back

退坡.definition: (intransitive) to weaken; to decrease; (of a subsidy etc) to be rolled back

退場.definition: to leave a place where some event is taking place; (of an actor) to exit; (sports) to leave the field; (of an audience) to leave

退守.definition: to retreat and defend; to withdraw and maintain one's guard

退居二線.definition: to withdraw to the second line of duty; to resign from a leading post (and assume an advisory post)

退市.definition: to be delisted (of a listed stock); to exit the market

退席.definition: to absent oneself from a meeting; to decline to attend

退庭.definition: to retire from the courtroom; to adjourn

退役.definition: (of military personnel or athletes) to retire; (of outdated equipment) to be decommissioned

退後.definition: to stand back; to go back (in time); to yield; to make concessions

退思園.definition: Retreat and Reflection Garden in Tongli, Jiangsu

退房.definition: to check out of a hotel room

退換貨.definition: to return a product for another item

退散.definition: to retreat and scatter; to recede; to wane

退步.definition: to do less well than before; to make a concession; setback; backward step; leeway; room to maneuver; fallback

退潮.definition: (of a tide) to ebb or go out

退燒藥.definition: antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)

退票.definition: to bounce (a check); to return a ticket; ticket refund

退而求其次.definition: to settle for second best; the next best thing

退色.definition: variant of 褪色[tui4 se4]; also pr. [tui4 shai3]

退行.definition: to recede; to degenerate; to regress

退訂.definition: to cancel (a booking); to unsubscribe (from a newsletter etc)

退讓.definition: to move aside; to get out of the way; to back down; to concede

退貨.definition: to return merchandise; to withdraw a product

退賽.definition: to pull out of the competition

退路.definition: a way out; a way to retreat; leeway

退選.definition: to withdraw from an election; to drop out of an elective course

退避三舍.definition: lit. to retreat ninety li (idiom); fig. to shun; to assiduously avoid

退還.definition: to return (sth borrowed etc); to send back; to refund; to rebate

退關.definition: shut-out, container or consigment not carried on the intended vessel or aircraft

退院.definition: to leave the hospital; (old) (of a monk) to leave the monastery

退隱.definition: to withdraw from the fray and live in seclusion; to retire

退黨.definition: to withdraw from a political party
